Package ohos.bluetooth

Class A2dpSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.bluetooth.A2dpSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProfileBase

    public final class A2dpSource
extends Object
implements ProfileBase
    Manages A2DP source profiles.

    The static method getProfile(ohos.app.Context) is used to obtain A2dpSource instances.

    You can use getDevicesByStates(int[]) to obtain devices in the specified state, use getDeviceState(ohos.bluetooth.BluetoothRemoteDevice) to obtain the status of a peer device, and use getPlayingState(ohos.bluetooth.BluetoothRemoteDevice) to obtain the A2dpSource playing status of a device.

    Since:
    1

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int STATE_NOT_PLAYING
      Indicates that the A2DP source is not playing.
      static int STATE_PLAYING
      Indicates that the A2DP source is playing.

    • Method Detail

      • getProfile

        public static A2dpSource getProfile​(Context context)
        Obtains the default A2dpSource instance to perform an A2DP source operation.
        Parameters:
        context - Ability context that contains package name.
        Returns:
        Returns the default A2dpSource instance.

      • getDevicesByStates

        public List<BluetoothRemoteDevice> getDevicesByStates​(int[] states)
        Description copied from interface: ProfileBase
        Obtains the list of devices in the specified status.
        Specified by:
        getDevicesByStates in interface ProfileBase
        Parameters:
        states - Indicates the connection status, which can be ProfileBase.STATE_DISCONNECTED, ProfileBase.STATE_CONNECTING, ProfileBase.STATE_CONNECTED, or ProfileBase.STATE_DISCONNECTING.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of BluetoothRemoteDevice matching the specified status.

      • getDeviceState

        public int getDeviceState​(BluetoothRemoteDevice device)
        Description copied from interface: ProfileBase
        Obtains the connection status of a BluetoothRemoteDevice in the current profile.
        Specified by:
        getDeviceState in interface ProfileBase
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BluetoothRemoteDevice.
        Returns:
        Returns the connection status, which can be ProfileBase.STATE_DISCONNECTED, ProfileBase.STATE_CONNECTING, ProfileBase.STATE_CONNECTED, or ProfileBase.STATE_DISCONNECTING.

      • getPlayingState

        public int getPlayingState​(BluetoothRemoteDevice device)
        Obtains the A2DP source playing status of a peer device.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the peer device BluetoothRemoteDevice.
        Returns:
        Returns the A2DP source playing status of the device, either STATE_PLAYING or STATE_NOT_PLAYING.
